Police FC vs Mukura Victory Sports

Police FC 3-2 Mukura Victory Sports

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:26

Umukino urangiye mu byishimo byinshi bya Police FC

Umutoza Albert Mphande wari umaze imikino ine adatsinda abonye amanota atatu imbere ya Mukura VS ayitsinda 3-2, ayibuza amahirwe yo kwegera APR FC iyoboye urutonde rwa shampiyona

17:25

94' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa Police FC

Amidou Ndayisaba asimbuye Iyabivuze Osee ku munota wa nyuma w'umukino

17:21

Iminota itanu y'inyongera

Iminota 90 y'umukino irangiye Police FC iyoboye umukino n'ibitego 3-2. Umusifuzi yemeje ko hongerwaho iminota itanu kubera iyatakaye bavura Umunyezamu wa Police FC

17:16

84' Umunyezamu wa Police FC ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo

Nyuma yo kuryama nta makosa akorewe, Barthez yitaweho n'abaganga, ahagurutse ahabwa ikarita y'umuhondo n'umusifuzi Salma

17:14

81' Umukino urahagaze

Abakinnyi babiri ba Police FC baryamiye rimwe. Iyabivuze Osee n'umunyezamu Danny Nduwayo bita Barthez baryamye hasi basaba kuvurwa n'abaganga nyamatra nta kosa bakorewe

17:11

Imikino y'ibirarane ntabwo iri guhira amakipe ayoboye urutonde

APR FC na Mukura VS ziyoboye urutonde rwa shampiyona ntabwo ba myugariro bazo bitwaye neza mu mukino y'ibirarane bari gukina kuko APR FC kuri uyu wa Gatatu yinjijwe ibitego bitatu na Sunrise FC, none na Mukura VS irabyinjijwe

17:07

74' Coup Franc ya Mukura VS

Umupira uzamukanywe na Iradukunda Bertrand akorerwa ikosa na Ishimwe Issa Zappy haboneka Coup franc itewe neza na Gael Duhayindavyi ariko umupira uca hejuru y'izamu

16:58

67' Mukura VS isimbuje yongera imbaraga mu busatirizi

Umutoza Haringingo Francis afashe umwanzuro wo gukuramo umukinnyi wo hagati Iddy Said Djuma aha umwanya rutahizamu Lomami Frank

16:56

65' IGITEGO CYIZA CYANE CYA POLICE FC

Ku makosa akomeye ya ba myugariro ba Mukura VS barimo Said Iragire na Mutijima Janvier; Mushimiyimana Mohamed atsindiye Police FC igitego cya gatatu ari hafi y'umurongo wa Koruneri.

Ateye ishoti rikomeye risanga umunyezamu Wilonja Ismail adahagaze neza umupira uhita ujya mu rushundura.

16:54

63' Gusimbuza ku mpande zombi

Jean Paul Uwimbabazi wa Police FC asimbuwe na Niyibizi Vedaste, naho Mukura VS yo isimbuza kapiteni Ciza Hussein Mugabo atanga umwanya kuri Asman Iddy

16:53

60' Ikarita ihawe Iyabivuze Osee

Abakinnyi ba Police FC barimo Iyabivuze Osee ntabwo bishimiye kuba Mukura VS yo itari guhabwa amakatita y'umuhondo. Ni nyuma yo gukorerwa ikosa na Gael Duhayindavyi. Uku kuburana kumuhesheje ikarita y'umuhondo

16:44

52' Gusimbuza kwa mbere ku ruhande rwa Police FC

Nyuma yo kubona igitego cyo kwishyura umutoza Albert Mphande ahise asimbuza avanamo Hakizimana Kevin Pastole amusimbuza rutahizamu Songa Isaie ngo bashake igitego cy'intsinzi

16:41

49' IGITEGO CYA KABIRI cya Police FC

Kapiteni Eric Gasongo atunguye umunyezamu wa Mukura VS Wilonja Ismail amutera ishoti rikomeye awukuramo ariko usanga rutahizamu Antoine Dominique ahagaze wenyine imbere y'izamu ahita yishyurira Police FC

16:39

48' IGITI CY'IZAMU gitabaye izamu rya Mukura VS

Myugariro Saidi Iragire akoze ikosa atakaza umupira ugera kuri Mushimiyimana Mohamed agerageje gutera mu izamu umupira ukorwaho na Mutijima ujya muri Koruneri, itewe neza ugera kuri Iyabivuze Osee atera ishoti rikomeye umupira ukubita ku mutambiko ujya hejuru y'izamu

16:35

Igice cya kabiri cy'umukino kiratangiye

Ikipe ya Mukura VS itangije igice cya kabiri ihita inasimbuza, Mutijima Janvier afata umwanya wa Hatungimana Basil, bombi bakina nka ba myugariro b'ibumoso

16:20

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

Abatoza babonye umwanya wo kugira inama no gutanga amabwiriza mashya ku bakinnyi babo. Turagaruka mu minota 15 tubagezaho igice cya kabiri

16:19

Iminota ibiri y'inyongera ku gice cya mbere

Kapiteni wa Police FC Ngendahimana Eric bita Gasongo ahawe umupira na Mushimiyimana Mohamed, atera ishoti ari hanze y'urubuga rw'amahina ariko umupira ujya kure cyane y'izamu, bihura n'uko iminota 45 ya mbere y'umukino irangiye, umusifuzi wa kane yongeraho iminota ibiri

16:15

41' Iddy Said Djuma ahushije igitego cyabazwe

Bertrand Iradukunda ahaye umupira mwiza Iddy Said Djuma bita N'Golo Kante acenga Muvandimwe JMV asigarana n'umunyezamu wenyine ariko ateye ishoti umupira uca ku ruhande gato

16:13

38' Mukura VS ikomeje kuryohereza abafana bayo

Guhererekanya ikipe ya Mukura VS ikomeje kubirusha Poice FC, tugereranyije MVS ifite umupira ku kigero cya 70% naho Police FC ya Albert Mphande iri gucungira kuri contre attaque ifite 30%.

16:09

32' Umukino ubaye uhagaze

Umunyezamu Nduwayo Danny bakunda kwita Barthez akorewe ikosa na Onesme Twizerimana none ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga

16:01

27' IGITEGO CYA KABIRI CYA Mukura VS

Umupira uzamukanywe na Bertrand Iradukunda atera ishoti umupira ugarurwa na Nduwayo Danny urindira Police FC ariko umupira arawuruka usanga Ciza Hussein Mugabo imbere y'izamu atsinda igitego cya kabiri

15:58

24' Ikarita ya mbere y'umuhondo y'umukino

Uwimbabazi Jean Paul wa Police FC akoreye ikosa Hatungimana Basil bimuhesha ikarita y'umuhondo. Coup franc ibonetse itewe na Munyakazi Yssuf Lule ariko umupira uca hejuru y'izamu

15:57

21' Mukura VS iri gukora amakosa menshi mu bwugarizi

Ikipe ya Mukura VS ikomeje guhererekanya neza ishaka igitego cya kabiri ariko ba myugariro bayo bari gukora amakosa menshi mu gihe Police FC igerageje kuzamuka. Iddy Saidi Djuma akoreye ikosa Antoine Dominique Ndayishimiye. Haboneka coup franc ariko Mohamed Mushimiyimana ayitera hejuru

15:47

12' IGITEGO CYO KWISHYURA CYA Mukura VS

Umurundi Duhayindavyi Gael afashe umupira acenga ba myugariro babiri ba Police FC yubura amaso aha neza rutahizamu Onesme Twizerimana afunga umupira n'umutwe awuha David Nshimirimana ahita ahindukiza umunyezamu Nduwayo Danny urindira Police FC.

15:41

06' IGITEGO CYA MBERE cya Police FC

Umukino utangiranye imbaraga nyinshi ku ruhande rwa Police FC. Umupira uzamukanywe na Iyabivuze Osee agerageje gucenga ba myugariro ba Mukura VS Basil Hatungimana amukorera ikosa mu rubuga rw'amahina haboneka Penaliti itewe na Hakizimana Kevin Pastole uri guhura na Mukura VS yahozemo. Umunyezamu Wilonja Ismail akuyemo umupira ariko ugarukira Kevin asongamo haboneka igitego cya mbere cya Police FC

15:38

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi Mukansanga Salm ugiye kuyobora uyu mukino arawutangije

15:00

Umukino wimuriwe aho wagombaga kubera

14:09

Umukino w'uyu munsi ugiye guhuza Mukura VS ya Gatatu na Police FC ya Karindwi

Police FC igiye kwakira Mukura VS itari mu bihe byiza kuko imaze imikino ine idatsinda. Naho umukino uheruka yatsinzwe na APR FC 2-0.

Mukura VS yo imaze iminsi iri mu bihe byiza ariko umukino uheruka batsinze Al-Hilal Club (Omdurman) 1-0, ariko basezererwa mu marushanwa ya CAF Confederation Cup ku giteranyo cyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ibitego 3-1 mu mukino ubanza nÃ¢â‚¬â„¢uwo kwishyura.
